project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks their score, and displays it at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Implement the game logic including question display and user input handling
Store questions and answers in a variable
Write tests for the game functionalities
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
